content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of 4 building blocks arranged in 2 layers:
- Bottom layer: 2 orange cylindrical pillars
- Top layer: 1 yellow rectangular block placed horizontally across the pillars and 1 orange triangular prism placed on top of the yellow block

## Spatial Relationships
- Two vertical orange cylindrical pillars are positioned parallel to each other, forming the base
- A horizontal yellow rectangular block is placed on top of both pillars, bridging them
- An orange triangular prism is placed on top of the yellow block, positioned near the center

# Block Selection from Dictionary

Based on the analysis, I need the following blocks from the dictionary:
- 2 orange vertical cylinders (index 6)
- 1 yellow horizontal rectangular block (index 2)
- 1 orange triangular prism (index 12)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6
    Step2: Move block with index 6
    Step3: Move block with index 2
    Step4: Move block with index 12
}
```

This assembly sequence starts with placing the two pillar cylinders, then adds the horizontal yellow block across them, and finally places the orange triangular prism on top to complete the structure.
